feed.title: Stirling PDF Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Stirling PDF: 0.31.0 Save signatures, Improved Compare and bug fixes
entry.content:
What's Changed

Enhancements

  • Sign now supports saved images to be re-used. See https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF?tab=readme-ov-file#reuse-stored-files
  • Optimization of SAML2 integration and improvement of certificate and error handling by @Ludy87 in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/2105
  • Modernize and secure temp file creation by @pixeebot in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/2106
  • Add new french translations by @florianfish in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/2120
  • Feature/298 improve compare performance by @reecebrowne in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/2124
  • Auto detect presence of external dependencies (LibreOffice etc) and disable/enable features dynamically by @Frooodle in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/2082
  • visual certificate signing by @sbplat in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/2084

Minor Enhancements

  • extract and apply the image orientation from exif data in imageToPdf by @sbplat in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/2073
  • Fix csrf by @Frooodle in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/2126

Translation Changes

  • Spanish translate by @manumora in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/2102
  • Update messages_de_DE.properties by @pixma140 in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/2070
  • Update messages_it_IT.properties by @albanobattistella in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/2077
  • added some missing translations by @swanemar in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/2085
  • Update translation files by @github-actions in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/2125
  • Update id_ID Translation and fix some grammars by @raniaamina in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/2108

Other Changes

  • Update 3rd Party Licenses by @github-actions in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/2080
  • Bump springBootVersion from 3.3.4 to 3.3.5 by @dependabot in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/2117
  • Bump org.springframework.boot from 3.3.4 to 3.3.5 by @dependabot in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/2118
  • Update 3rd Party Licenses by @github-actions in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/2119
  • :floppy_disk: Update Version by @github-actions in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/2132
  • Bump org.springframework.security:spring-security-saml2-service-provider from 6.3.3 to 6.3.4 by @dependabot in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/2052
  • Update 3rd Party Licenses by @github-actions in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/2134

New Contributors

  • @pixma140 made their first contribution in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/2070
  • @swanemar made their first contribution in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/2085
  • @florianfish made their first contribution in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/2120
  • @raniaamina made their first contribution in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/2108
  • @M0NsTeRRR made their first contribution in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/2109

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/compare/v0.30.1...v0.31.0

entry.title: New release for Stirling PDF: v0.31.1 Bug fix for compress PDF
entry.content:
What's Changed

Bug Fixes

  • [bug fix] Update compress-pdf.html by @Frooodle in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/2138

Translation Changes

  • Update messages_it_IT.properties by @albanobattistella in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/2135

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/compare/v0.31.0...v0.31.1

entry.title: New release for Stirling PDF: 0.32.0 Several bug fixes, multi-tool support blank page and more!
entry.content:
Major Enhancements

  • [Feature] Set Executor Instances limits dynamically from properties by @rafael-encinas in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/2193
  • Add option to insert blank page between pages in Multi-tool (#2194) by @thisisrenan in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/2201
  • Removed CLI block on .exe installs to instead use dependency detection allowing Windows users to use CLI programs if installed

Other changes

Bug Fixes

  • navbar.css: prevent overlapping of elements by @pheiduck in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/2140
  • fix sign pdf with cert signature logo not loading and add option to disable it by @sbplat in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/2143
  • Fix: Navbar layout overflow by @MaratheHarshad in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/2162
  • fix remmeber me (WIP) by @Frooodle in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/2184
  • Added input sanitization to fix self-xss issue by @Hotanya in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/2189
  • Fix: Card has no favorite icon by @Ludy87 in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/2203
  • Fix: Path correction to draggable.js #2154 + little makeup by @Ludy87 in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/2159
  • Fix: Add missing .map file for minified files by @Ludy87 in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/2156
  • Fix: Auto language detection #2122 by @Ludy87 in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/2148

Minor Enhancements

  • Fix: redeclaration of const and add: tranlation placeholder for Session Expiry Messages by @Ludy87 in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/2158
  • Searchbar in nav auto select, and exe nolonger disable CLI by @Frooodle in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/2197

Translation Changes

  • Update translation files by @github-actions in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/2145
  • Update messages_it_IT.properties by @albanobattistella in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/2146
  • Update messages_it_IT.properties by @albanobattistella in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/2161
  • Completed translations for 19 languages using AI by @Sf298 in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/2164
  • Corrects AI generated translation by @Ludy87 in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/2166
  • Update and improve zh_TW Traditional Chinese locale by @PeterDaveHello in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/2188

New Contributors

  • @pheiduck made their first contribution in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/2140
  • @MaratheHarshad made their first contribution in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/2162
  • @Hotanya made their first contribution in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/2189
  • @rafael-encinas made their first contribution in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/2193
  • @thisisrenan made their first contribution in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/2201

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/compare/v0.31.1...v0.31.2

entry.title: New release for Stirling PDF: 0.33.0 Multi-tool enhancements with multi selection
entry.content:
Multi-tool now supports multi-selection both via checkbox and our normal '1-10,12' style for its various operations meaning it now has advanced rotation/delete/extract operations with a nice UI

What's Changed

Bug Fixes

  • Fix: Reading the username based on the login method. by @Ludy87 in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/2211
  • Fix canvas crop by @DimK10 in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/2221
  • Increase watermark coverage to fill page (#2049) by @thisisrenan in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/2220
  • Fix: Ensure backend receives false when checkbox is unchecked in split-pdf-by-chapters feature by @MaratheHarshad in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/2234
  • Fix: missing opener for View PDF #2206 by @Ludy87 in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/2207

Enhancements

  • Restricting file input to .md files for Markdown to PDF conversion by @MaratheHarshad in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/2219
  • Feature/1976/multi tool multiple pages by @reecebrowne in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/2200
  • Multitool advertising by @reecebrowne in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/2247

Translation Changes

  • Clear file inputs after jobs by @rafael-encinas in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/2248
  • Update messages_ca_CA.properties by @leo-jmateo in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/2210
  • Update messages_it_IT.properties by @albanobattistella in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/2239
  • Update translation files by @github-actions in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/2252
  • Update messages_it_IT.properties by @albanobattistella in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/2250

Minor Enhancements

  • Add: missing swagger Tag by @Ludy87 in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/2238
  • Prohibit the registration of unauthorized usernames by @Ludy87 in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/2240

New Contributors

  • @leo-jmateo made their first contribution in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/2210
  • @neuhaus made their first contribution in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/2226

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/compare/v0.32.0...v0.33.0

entry.title: New release for Stirling PDF: 0.33.1 Docker hub move to stirlingtools/stirling-pdf
entry.content:
We are moving our docker from frooodle/s-pdf to stirlingtools/stirling-pdf and for github image we are doing the same naming change to the full stirling-pdf instead of its shorthand

We are going to be releasing to both places going forward to give migration time with a switch eventually coming Please switch to docker image stirlingtools/stirling-pdf

What's Changed

Bug Fixes

  • Fixing bug: Add Image makes random changes to image (#2246) by @thisisrenan in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/2256
  • Fix canvas pdf to csv by @DimK10 in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/2228

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/compare/v0.33.0...v0.33.1
